channel.title: Snowday
channel.description: Yes, we are lucky, those of us that go to DCDS, and all surrounding schools. What are you to do on YOUR snow day [if applicable]?

item.title: Snowday
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:18, topic:165435”][quote author=Casey. link=topic=224468.msg1936396#msg1936396 date=1197910366]
Lucky you

Unfortuanlty, in South Florida we do not get snow, but when I live in New York I would just play in it with my friends[Take in I was under 10]

Using IE so spelling might be bad
[/quote]

I was at Fort Myers/Cape Coral this weekend, it was fcking windy…[/quote]
Ah, I lived in Fort Myers for a bit
It’s been windy very lately(because on water) and since I live right next to the gulf, its fucking freezing because of heavy win and cold weather

item.title: Snowday
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Ye… Sometimes I hate it, sometimes I love it. What I’m saying is:We Brit’s can handle the cold alot better than the Americans can (Mostly, there has to be some cold places over there right?), or whoever lives in warm countries.

It will take you alot longer in the cold to say “This is too cold” than it will for one of the aforementioned peepz in this weather… Meaning we can withstand it much better. We just don’t realize how used to the cold we are.

Read full topic

item.title: Snowday
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Gotta Catch Them All:

We have the day off tomorrow because our school can’t afford to hire competent plumbers to fix the broken boiler. Also we could have the rest of the week off if it takes longer than expected to fix.

lucky :
my schools power went out, the pipes were frozen shut, there was no water or heat, and it was -5 on the first floor… we still had to go to school
and im pretty sure they did a bad job because afterwards there was a smell of burning play doh…
im amazed we got today off, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Snowday
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Just because we can handle it doesn’t mean we want to. Being cold sucks its the gayest experience in the world! You heard me, the cold is homosexual!

Read full topic

item.title: Snowday
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

The Un-Named:

Err? It never stops raining in England. It’s NEVER sunny, literally, I had more sun in August than the whole summer, and to top that off, I live in the warmer part of England!

It’s nothing you can’t handle though. It’s worse up here in Scotland, still, there are great days sometimes.

Read full topic

item.title: Snowday
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Gotta Catch Them All:

We have the day off tomorrow because our school can’t afford to hire competent plumbers to fix the broken boiler. Also we could have the rest of the week off if it takes longer than expected to fix.

Not fair… TBH school should have ended last weeks. Our diaries don’t even give you space to write down coursework so we weren’t meant to go to school this week! It’s shit like 4 days before Christmas.

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:19, topic:165435”][quote author=goatee link=topic=224468.msg1936636#msg1936636 date=1197929930]
Wheres the warm part of England?
[/quote]

Southwest. We got the warm see breeze, I don’t recall it ever reaching minus temperature where I live.[/quote]

Wierd… in the south east (where I am) it’s always freezing.

Read full topic

item.title: Snowday
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“I Br3ndan I, post:11, topic:165435”][quote author=cooper link=topic=224468.msg1936582#msg1936582 date=1197927416]
haha dont argue about snow…
Let me apologize for my country I don’t pollute, I don’t even have a car… today im 2 years away though
[/quote]

Sorry but it just annoys me so much how people say they can’t cope with the weather, when they’re out in it every day no bother…[/quote]
Yeah I understand, I personally love the cold but heat doesn’t bother me either.

item.title: Snowday
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

r4ndom1:

You fagots better stop polluting I mean ffs its not going to snow in england now because of you. I hope your happy because I certainly won’t be in our new (cold dry/hot wet) climate. grrr.

Shut up. People from the UK act as if the cold weather is unbearable. We are used to it, so we can handle it. When it gets worse, we’ll adapt.

Read full topic
